attributes.action: make mobile phone companies responsible for cash back offers on their phones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of people are being left out of pocket with cash back offers. You enter a contract with the phone provider not the phone company to whom you pay full monthly rental to. Invariably the cash back never materialises they go bankrupt or lose the vouchers any excuse and the provider does not honour the cash back but you are obliged to keep paying the full contract price even though the cash back deal was of the essence and prime factor in you entering the agreement in the first place.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
